English.Text: The doctor is praised for a quickness of thought. "Wolf's bane, of the slopes above," words pour out, "classically lethal, but by Jove, I have an idea!" An extraordinary antidote is proposedâ€” a posset of deadly nightshade, and its effect is remarkable. "Don't ask me how, but it has worked!" the doctor says cheerfully, as the victims of the poison darts return to normal. Your expedition marks the territory on the map for the sake of anthropology, before taking the long road around it.
